code: import React from"react";import{OverlayTrigger,Tooltip}from"react-bootstrap";import{currencySymbolHandling}from"../sharedMethod";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Widget=props=>{const{title,value,currency,icon,className,iconClass,onClick,allConfigData}=props;const renderTooltip=props=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Tooltip,{id:"button-tooltip",...props,children:[currency," ",value]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-xxl-3 col-xl-4 col-sm-6 widget",onClick:onClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`${className} shadow-md rounded-10 p-xxl-10 px-7 py-10 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between my-3`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${iconClass} widget-icon rounded-10 d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center`,children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-end text-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OverlayTrigger,{placement:"bottom",delay:{show:250,hide:400},overlay:renderTooltip,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"fs-1-xxl fw-bolder text-white",children:currencySymbolHandling(allConfigData,currency,value,true)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-0 fs-4 fw-light",children:title})]})]})});};export default Widget;
